name: Hop For The Best - Kickstarter Demo
name_original: Hop For The Best - Kickstarter Demo
description:
Hop For The Best is an indie clay-style platformer game being developed by a solo developer under the name SplashFire Studios. 

A Kickstarter campaign will be running for this project from July 1st- July 30th.

Follow The Kickstarter

View the Hop For The Best website

Wishlist on Steam

Follow on Twitter

Press Kit

Any and all support is much appreciated. 

Sprint, roll, climb, dash, and hop through beautiful clay inspired worlds. With no way to attack and danger at every turn, all you can do is…

Hop For The Best!

This early demo is still very much a work in progress, but contains 4 playable levels in 4 game modes. 

Please note that this is a gameplay only demo, but that story and cutscene sequences are planned for the final release of the game.
